title: Leek Factory Tycoon
description: Leek Factory Tycoon is an idle game where you will be managing your dream Leek Factory. Enjoy a steady flow of idle cash as you expand and upgrade your factories for big profits. Build an extensive conveyor belt system to transport and process your leeks, creating fantastic recipes. Even when you're offline, your restaurant stays open, earning you passive income. Play at your own pace or fine-tune your empire to compete on the live global leaderboard. Show the world your restaurant strategy is the most profitable!
